page.title: 10Tourism in North Yorkshire
page.content: There are pre-historic sites,ancient bridges & wells. A wealth of wildlife including deer & succesion of wild flowers. Walkers can use the old mine tracks & footpaths across Spaunton moor.{Lastingham church}& crypt are among the top ten most visited in England. Cropton has a craft shop & an art studio. The area has 2 general stores with post office (one of which has an off licence),a small hotel,an inn & a licenced restaurant. Bed & breakfast accommodation is available together with self catering cottages. All the residents work hard to maintain an active rural life in an area full of history & tradition. The observant visitor will experience a sense of timelessness rarely found today.
